snippet: Extracting one sentence from a draft report, a climate skeptic asserts that an international body has decided that cosmic rays are a major cause of global warming. But he omits the report's surrounding context, which discredits the cosmic ray theory.
abstract: Extracting one sentence from a draft report, a climate skeptic asserts that an international body has decided that cosmic rays are a major cause of global warming. But he omits the report's surrounding context, which discredits the cosmic ray theory.

headline.main: A Contrarian Spin on the Next Big Climate Report
